article_title: Man flown to hospital after Jensen Beach Causeway shooting
article_text:
Authorities with the Martin County Sheriff’s Office said a man was shot in the stomach at the west end of the Jensen Beach Causeway Saturday afternoon.

A news release indicated the man was flown to Lawnwood Medical Center. Authorities said detectives were questioning a suspect in connection with the shooting.

The causeway’s entrance was shut down temporarily while authorities were completing their investigation.

article_metadata.author: Rob McLean
